titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Robert Robertson, Indictment
CWG5453

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Floyd Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Ky
vs
Robert Robertson

The Grand Jury of Floyd County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Robert Robertson of the offence of Robbery Committed as follows towit the said Robert Robertson on the 1st day of January March 1864 in the County aforesaid did willfully and feloniously & with force of arms & by putting in fear break & prise open the house of Ezekel Wells & Rob it of clothing & household goods & convey the same away against his will & consent against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

J S Dury Cmth Atty
A Copy Attest
John G Johns C. F. C. C
7
Commonwealth
vs } Robbery
Robert RobertsonTrue Bill
Jas Delong foremanComnth Witnesses
Ezekial Wells & wife
Morgan Slone &
Sarah Hamilton
A Copy Attest
John G Johns
C. F. C. C
